name: Coin Flip Hero
description:
You are bound to meet some weird folk when roaming the galaxy. Don't forget to say hi.

Made in 48 hours for Global game jam January 2022!

Recommended to play with sound!

Credits: 

Mirko Sršen - programming

Jurica Cvetko - art - https://juricacvetko.com

Alessandro Famà - sound - https://alessandrofama.com/
